events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and are excited to review your profile thoroughly.
Your application has been categorised under Engineering based on the relevant experience and skills you presented on your resume.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your case to guide you through the recruitment process for the engineering role.
The initial screening call was conducted to discuss your background, motivations, and fit for the Software Engineer position.
You promptly responded to our screening feedback, expressing enthusiasm and availability for the next interview stage.
Your technical interview has been scheduled with our engineering team next week, focusing on algorithms and system design.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and knowledge of software development.
The HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture, benefits, and your career aspirations with our human resources team.
You completed the HR interview and shared valuable insights about your personal goals and how they align with our company values.
An offer has been proposed to you for the Software Engineer role, including salary details, benefits, and onboarding plans.
You have happily accepted the job offer and are looking forward to joining the team and starting your new role.
Your onboarding process has officially started. Welcome to the company! You will receive all necessary resources and introductions.
The hiring process has been successfully closed with your full integration into the engineering team and active project involvement.
